message.content:
{"id": "123727", "title": "The 'Top N' and 'Bottom N' functions do not work", "description": "When creating a report, the 'Top N' and 'Bottom N' functions are not functioning as expected. Steps to reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new report. 2. Add a new datasource and a dataset. 3. Create a report parameter. 4. Add a chart to the layout. 5. In the chart dialogue, click the 'select data' tab and click the 'filters' button. 6. Set two filter conditions, one using the 'Top N' function and the other using the report parameter. The expected result is that the chart should be filtered based on the specified conditions, but this is not happening.", 
"OB": "The 'Top N' and 'Bottom N' functions are not functioning as expected when creating a report.", 
"EB": "The 'Top N' and 'Bottom N' functions should properly filter the chart data based on the specified conditions.", 
"SR": "The development team should investigate and fix the issue with the 'Top N' and 'Bottom N' functions not working correctly in the report creation process."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
